## Grup V
```{r echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
suppressMessages(library(stringr))
teamnames <- readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/Futbol/teamlist.rds")
table <- readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/Futbol/futstat_tables.rds") %>% filter(league == 'tercera_division_rfef_5') %>% left_join(teamnames, by = "team") %>% arrange(rank) %>% mutate(league = str_sub(league,1,-3)) %>% left_join(readRDS("~/GoogleDrive/Futbol/futstat_playoff.rds"), by = "team") %>% mutate(playoff.ascens = playoff.ascens/2, t1a = rowSums(cbind(t1, playoff.ascens), na.rm = T)) 
table$linkteam <- iconv(table$fullname,to="ASCII//TRANSLIT")
table$linkteam <- tolower(gsub("[[:punct:]]", "", table$linkteam))
table$linkteam <- gsub("[[:space:]]", "_", table$linkteam)
table$form <- paste0("![](bars/",tolower(gsub("[[:punct:]]", "", table$team)),".png)")
table$team <- paste0("[", table$shortname, "](/clubs/", table$linkteam,"_",table$league,")")
table <- table %>% select(team,form,rank,pts,t1a,t1,t2,des,xGF,xGA,qualitat)
kable(table, digits = 1, align = 'lcccccccccc', row.names = FALSE, col.names = c('Club','Forma','Class.','Punts','Ascens','Asc.Dir.','Playoff','Descens','F','C','Qual.')) %>% add_header_above(c('Temporada' = 4, 'Probabilitat (%)' = 4, 'xGols' = 3)) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T) %>% column_spec(4, border_right = T) %>% column_spec(8, border_right = T)
```
